dict.acceptation: 王冠；花冠（有时象征胜利）；王权；（某物的）顶部；
（尤指通过增添成就、成功等）使圆满；为…加冕；使圆满完成；给…以荣誉；

sent.orig: One-dimensional Chain Crown Ether Complexes. Synthesis and Crystal Structure of 18-Crown-6 Complex:[Na(18-Crown-6)]_2[Zn(mnt)_2]
sent.trans: 一维链状冠醚配合物：[Na(18-C-6)]_2[Zn(mnt)_2]的合成与晶体结构（英文）

sent.orig: Crown Prince Naruhito, 46, and Crown Princess Masako, 42 have one child, 4-year-old Princess Aiko.
sent.trans: 46岁的皇太子德仁和42岁的皇太妃雅子只有一个4岁的女儿爱子公主。

sent.orig: Main treatment: Acute crown arteries syndrome, Also uses in the intervention therapy through skin crown artery.
sent.trans: 主要治疗：急性冠脉综合症，也用于经皮冠脉介入治疗法。

sent.orig: The soil should cover just the roots and not the crown crown onthe plant.
sent.trans: 土壤只需刚好盖住根部而不要高过植物的冠部。

sent.orig: Jesus, Savior, reigned for ever and ever, Crown Him! Crown Him! Prophet and Priest and King!
sent.trans: 耶稣基督掌权直到永永远远，冠祂！冠祂！先知祭司君王！
